title: Maximizing the Effectiveness of Online Math Training Through Active Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary arithmetic operations and fundamental mathematical concepts required for daily tasks
context.additional_context: Primarily smartphone-based learning, requiring the design of short, focused modules.

learning_goals: Learners can apply and explain statistical concepts (mean, ratio, graph interpretation) required for analyzing business documents
Learners improve data analysis skills by solving case-based problems provided in a mobile environment

Learners share mathematical problem-solving strategies (e.g., equation application, graph interpretation) with three peers on an online discussion platform at least twice weekly, and achieve a score of 4 or higher on a 5-point self-efficacy scale.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
